title: Rahu Transit in the 3rd House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 3rd house for Taurus Ascendant activates intense focus on communication, self-effort, and personal courage. This phase encourages bold initiatives, unconventional ideas, and strategic risk-taking. Mental restlessness increases, pushing experimentation in skills, media, and short-term ventures. Relationships with siblings and peers may feel competitive or unpredictable. Success comes through smart planning rather than impulsive action. When channelled consciously, Rahu strengthens persuasive power, adaptability, and the ability to turn calculated effort into visible momentum.

sections.heading: Courage & Self-Effort
points: Strong urge to take bold initiatives

sections.heading: Communication & Media
points: Interest in media and digital platforms
Ability to persuade and market ideas

closing: Rahu in the 3rd house amplifies effort and expression. Awareness and strategy turn restlessness into productive momentum.
